Examples: "This grant aims to study the effects of climate change on the migration patterns of bird species across North America. Over the course of the five-year project, the research team will employ cutting-edge tracking techniques and extensive field work to gather data. The findings will be used to predict future shifts in bird migration, and inform wildlife conservation strategies. In addition, this study will contribute to the broader understanding of the impacts of global warming on biodiversity and ecosystems."

Description: The denormalized manifest for grant submission.
The full name of the institution(s) associated with the grant. (e.g. Harvard University). 1...*
The alias of the institution(s) associated with the grant (e.g. UCSD). 1...*
A unique primary key that enables record updates using schematic.
The Synapse team associated with the grant, created by the MC2 Center
The Synapse project associated with the grant, created by the MC2 Center
Examples: Synapse_ID: syn123456789, Grant_Name: NIH Brain Initiative Grant

Description: The start date of the grant YYYY-MM-DD format
Link to the search results for this grant number on the NIH Reporter website
Duration of the funding period, in years
Date at which an embargo on related resources had lifted
